AIConsentStatusChangeProtocol

@objc
public protocol AIConsentStatusChangeProtocol : NSObjectProtocol

AIConsentStatusChangeProtocol is the protocol to be implemented in order to get callbacks when the registered Consent Definition Status changes

Since

2018.3.0
  • consentStatusChanged(for:error:requestedStatus:)

    Method which will be called when Consent Status changes for the registered Consent Defintion

    Since

    2018.3.0

    Declaration

    Swift

    func consentStatusChanged(for consentDefinition: ConsentDefinition, error: NSError?, requestedStatus: Bool) -> <<error type>>

    Parameters

    consentDefinition

    The Consent Definition whose Consent Status has changed
    error

    The error encountered while updating the Consent Definition status
    requestedStatus

    The requested value of the Consent Definition Status to be updated
